description: A vegetarian take on coronation chicken with curry roasted cauliflower and flaked almonds.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Spicy Coronation Cauliflower with Flaked Almonds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Toss the chopped cauliflower in olive oil and add the curry powder, mixing well to coat all florets. Roast for 20-25 minutes until slightly charred.
Toast the flaked almonds in a saucepan over a medium high heat for 2 minutes, toss frequently so they don't burn.
Whisk together yoghurt, lemon juice and mango chutney in a large bowl, add the spring onions and cauliflower and mix well. Scatter toasted almonds and fresh coriander on top and serve.
